inclusion.criterion: OS ASD with an indication of interventional closure according to the European Cardiology society guidelines of 2010.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: significant shunt (signs of right ventricular volume overload)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ASD, regardless the size, with suspicion of paradoxal embolism
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PVR > or egal 5 WU but <2/3 Systemic Vascular Resistance or Pulmonary Arterial Pressure < 2/3 systemic pressure and evidence of net Left-to Right shunt (Qp/Qs > 1,5)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with the French Social Security System
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Difficulties of cooperation (patient under assisted ventilation)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary disease or respiratory failure
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
